As Rebecca empties the contents you relax to see that there is enough food for both of you but you are nervous again as you see sandwiches, salads, and soups giving Rebecca any choice if she were to decide to eat you.

"Now let's get down to business." Rebecca says and as she does you black out and quickly reawaken shrunken down to three inches on Rebecca's desk. "What's this all about?" you ask Rebecca. "I'm going to give you a promotion,” she answers. When you hear this thoughts start racing. Is it a real promotion and did Rebecca just shrink you for fun and would later restore your size? Is it a promotion to boss's lunch, like the one guy you had about received when he hit on Rebecca in front of the whole office? Or is it a promotion to the lunch of Samantha, the red haired beauty with a mighty fine body and a pair of D-cups that was head of the sales division of the company who you knew wanted to get her crimson lips around you. You seriously hoped that this is a real authentic promotion, Rebecca will restore your size and you can have a nice laugh about it over lunch. "What kind of promotion?" you ask Rebecca.

What kind of promotion is it?
132.title: Rick Receives A Promotion From Rebecca

133.content:
You were busily working at your desk though a little more cautious than usual. Lisa was sick today and you had to be on your toes at all times. You knew that if you were shrunk today there was close to no hope for your survival. As the bell for the lunch break rang you quickly ran to the break room to get your lunch out of the fridge. You always ate at your desk and never dared to stay in the break room any longer than you possibly had to, for obvious reasons. But today as you were retrieving your lunch a button popped off your shirt you knew it was risky but you searched hurriedly for your lost button when all of the sudden you were dizzy and blacked out. When you awoke you knew right then that you had been shrunk and you were now on the break room table staring into the face of Samantha, the brunette 26 year old secretary with a nice body. "Why hello, Rick." she said through her crimson lips. "Just go ahead and eat me." you said, not wanting any more humiliation. "Why would I do that?" she asked "I have a lunch right here, but if you want me to eat you I will." But before you could answer Samantha she had pulled out a coin. "OK, heads I eat you, tails I don't." Your eyes were glued on the coin as it flipped through the air and landed on the table.

Heads or Tails?
133.title: Rick's Life Is All Fun And Games

14.content:
You are a lovely sixteen year old high school girl named Melissa. You are now in you sophomore year. You are 5ft 5ins tall at the moment and have medium length red hair, C-cup breasts, and nice thick thighs with a sexy round ass that jiggles slightly when you walk. You are a little on the plump side, but you know you look great because you have had may guys ask you out, you are just waiting for the right guy. You decided that you are bi because you have the tendency to have the hots for other girls. You and your friend Gina made out once. She said she liked it and you guessed you did too. Gina looks the same as you body wise, but had brunette hair.
         You donât have the shrinking power as most girls do, and you have done a good job keeping it secret so far, the only person you told is Gina. You had been scared at first to tell her because you knew she had the power, but when you did tell her she told you that she would never shrink you, she said she didnât have the heart to eat her best friend. You thought by the look in her eyes that she might have been lying, but you werenât sure; also it has been a month since you told her and you have been over to her place seven times and not once did she shrink you. You hope your secret is safe with Gina, because if it got out that you didnât have the power, it most definitely wouldnât be long before you were in some girlâs lunch bag in between two slices of bread.
         Worst of all if the cheerleaders found outâ¦they were the worst of the girls in school to be shrunk by, especially at this time of year at the beginning of September. Over the next few days they would be looking for three girls with out the power. They will shrink the girls to twenty inches and the three girls will be served at the annual end of summer barbecue that all the popular students put together. It was only a few days away on this Saturday. You could imagine what would happen if your secret is known, it wouldnât be long before you were approached by one of the cheerleaders and captured. If that happened, this Saturday afternoon, you would be sizzling on a grill with a cheerleader standing over you giggling and basting you with some kind of barbecue sauce. Well you really didnât have to imagine it; you remember your older cousin Kate, the family barbecued her during one of the family get togethers. You didnât want to eat part of her but your mom made you, to your horror you thought she was delicious. Your mom has the power and she just found out that you donât. Lately she has been hinting that sheâs going to make you into the thanksgiving bird at the family thanksgiving. Hints like ever once in a while she will poke and pinch your ass and say âgobble gobbleâ. You hope she is just kidding; you donât want to be stuffed and roasted.
         Even if your mom doesnât use you at thanksgiving, you also had to worry about December, because you could end up as the familyâs holiday ham, which happened to your other cousin Heather last year. Today is Wednesday. You have just gotten to school and you are in your biology class, your teacher is the lovely twenty-five year old Miss Summers. She has the power too, youâve seen her eat one guy for disrupting her class and you had a feeling that she wouldnât mind eating a girl as well. You just have to be careful; you donât know what could happen today.

Choose a choiceâ¦.
14.title: High School Girl With No Power.

141.content:
One thing you forgot to think of is that Cheerleaders are good a pressuring information out of people. Class ended and you started off to your locker. Before you got there you notice that the head cheerleader, Jenny, and another cheerleader, Erica, heading straight for you. You felt they were out to get you. You were right, you tried to lose them but they were too quick. Erica pinned you against a wall next to a row of lockers. Jenny and Erica are both 5ft 6ins tall with athletic body types with C-cup breasts, tight round asses and long smooth sexy legs. They both have long hair; Jenny is blond, while Erica is a brunette. âWhat going on girls,â You said already knowing what is happening.
         âWell, Melissa,â Jenny said and walked up, then ran her hand up along your left leg, and reached around and grabbed your ass, âI had a feeling you didnât have the power, so I sort a threatened your friend Gina, and she told me I was right.â You struggled but you couldnât get free. Jenny smiled, âIt might interest you to know that Gina told us about you on the condition that she is invited to the Barbecue party. I of course said yes; I wonât deny the girl a tasty plate of her barbecued friend.â Jenny grabbed your ass again, âWhen I first saw you in history class, I hoped you didnât have the power, because I canât resist cooking up plump girls like you. You have a well rounded plump ass; I canât wait to taste it.â Erica pulled down your top and bra, revealing your lovely breasts, and she fondled them and licked them both, âI canât wait to have part of one of these on my plate, they look nice and tender.â You just couldnât believe you are exposed like this in school. Guys and girls alike love the spectacle that the cheerleaders are putting on.
         Your biology teacher, Miss Summers, apparently heard the commotion and came out to see. Miss Summers ran over, âGirls what are you doing to Melissa, in the school no less.â Jenny grinned, âOh hi Miss Summers, Erica and I are just capturing one of the tasty girls that we will be barbecuing at the end of summer party.â âOh, pour Melissa, you donât have the power, Iâm sorry,â Miss Summers said with a slight frown, then it turned into a smile, âGirls, you two wouldnât mind if I stopped by the party this Saturday and had a plate of Melissa meat?â Jenny giggled, âNot at all Miss Summers, I think a young hard working teacher like you deserves to have a good meal for teaching us so much.â Miss Summers laughed and patted Jenny on the shoulder, âIâm flattered; Iâll see what I can do about getting you some extra credit points. Just remember Iâm coming, save me a nice piece of Melissa thigh for me, I love barbecued girl-steak.â âSure thing Miss S,â Jenny said. You had been clueless that so many people wanted to eat you. The image came to mind that everywhere you walked; people were looking at you and seeing a plump delicious ham walking by.
         âWe have seven periods left before the end of the day, so I have to keep you from escaping,â Jenny said and pointed her finger at you and you began to shrink out of your clothes; you stopped shrinking at twenty inches, barbecue size, and Jenny grabbed a big blue duffle bag and forced you inside it. You couldnât see a thing after Jenny sipped the bag closed. You felt as Jenny slung you behind her back, ready to carry you from class to class. You heard Jenny speak, âIâll take Melissa home with me to keep until Saturday, since I was the one that got her friend Gina to give her up. Besides, Iâm going to let you take that Tina girl home with you, after you capture her after your next class.â âFair enough,â Erica replied. Remembered Tina, she is in your English class. She medium length blond hair and is 5ft 3ins with the same kind of plump and sexy body type as you, maybe a little plumper, with D-cup breasts and a fine round ass. Before, you had actually planned on asking her if she like to fool around with other girls, because Gina and you had discussed how both of you wanted to feel Tina up, but you had been scared to ask her, because you had been afraid that afterwards, Gina might want to shrink and eat Tina, you didnât want to put her through that. But it doesnât matter now, since this Saturday Tina would be cooking along side you.
         You went though the rest of the day being lugged around by Jenny. At lunch she opened the bag to show you off to the rest of the cheerleader squad. During that time you had to endure all of them pinching, poking, and rubbing on you while they licked their lips and named off parts of you they wanted to have this Saturday. One cheerleader shouted to the other cheerleaders, âOooh, weâll be getting some nice and juicy girly-back ribs off her!â Then all the other cheerleaders responded in agreement on how delicious girly-back ribs are. Finally the school day came to an end and Jenny took you home with her. She let you out in her room, which would have seemed pretty big, even if you were normal size. She sat you on her bed and gave you a pat on your head, âNot that I think you could escape this room anyway since you are small now, but donât leave this room. You just have to face the facts that you are going to be barbecued this Saturday. Iâll be back in a little bit.â Jenny left the room and closed the door. You knew you wouldnât be able to reach the doorknob, so you decided to lie back on her bed and try to relax. Jenny turned you on anyway, and you hoped that she would fool around with you a few times before Saturday. You thought it was the least she could do for a girl that was days away from being barbecued meat on the hungry party goers plates.

Chooseâ¦
141.title: A Problem With The Cheerleaders.

1411.content: As you are lying on the bed watching your life pass before your eyes, you hear the sound of someone at the door. You jump when you hear the sound of someone knocking on the door. and hear, "You Hoo Jenny do you have your dirty clothes for me, are you decent?" You can't believe your luck. this could be your chance to escape. You quickly dive off the bed and into the pile of dirty clothes on the floor. Maybe, just maybe you can make your escape. You hear the door open and out of a corner of the pile you see the mother just standing there lost in thought. Minutes seem like hours then suddenly...
1411.title: Choice.1 mom comes in to get laundry

14111.content: Jenny's mom looks down and sees the huge pile of dirty clothes on the floor. and says " Oh good, she has them ready to be washed." and picks you and all the clothes in one big pile and carries them to the laundry room. She wonders why the clothes are so heavy , but then shrugs her shoulders and tosses the entire load into the washing machine, adds soap and slams the door shut. She then goes on to do some more work around the house. You are horrified when you feel the luke warm water start to rise and hear the machine's motor starts to hum. You don't know what will be worse, being barbecued for a bunch of hungry students, or being tossed around and drowned in a load of laundry. The water is almost to the top and at any second the machine will start. You look out the window of the washing machine and can see Jenny's mom a few feet away and decided to knock on the glass hoping she will let you out, Who knows, she may even turn you back to your normal size.
14111.title: Laundry time

15.content:

You are 5ft 6ins tall with long brunette hair that frames your D-cup breasts and have a lovely round ass with thick thighs; you have that healthy sexy plump body type. What is dangerous about your job is that you donât have the shrinking power. If a costumer found out, she might order you for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, whichever shift you were working. Only girls and women come to the restaurant to eat, because guys are too afraid they will end up on the menu. Though, you have been reassured by head chef Rita who is the owner of the restaurant that she will not serve you to the customers if you keep doing a great job as you have.
         You have been surprised by the casual nature of the customers. One time a business woman who was entertaining a client, asked after you introduced yourself, âSarah, I would like you with lettuce tomato, and cheese on rye.â Another time during a breakfast shift, a teenage girl grabbed your ass and said, âI want your delicious body in an omelet.â Rita just laughed ever time you said what a customer said. Youâve had nightmares about one of the waitresses you work with bringing you out on a plate to serve to a hungry customer; also one where Rita is humming happily as she stuffs and bastes you in preparation for the oven.
         After work, you would go to your apartment which you shared with a roommate, Stacy. She has your body type except she has blond hair. You know she has the power because you have seen her shrink several of her boyfriends, they ended up as her breakfast, lunch, or dinner. One thanksgiving she grabbed the plump eighteen year old redheaded girl from next door, she shrunk her and roasted her in place of the traditional holiday bird. You had to admit that the girl was delicious, especially the leftover girl meat sandwiches the next day. Stacy doesnât know that you donât have the power. You know if she found out, with how much she loved eating shrunken people that no more than an hour after, you would be between two slices of bread or roasting in the oven. Though you have been getting along very well, you hoped if she found out, that since you have been a great friend, that she might not eat you.
         Today you are working the lunch shift, and it is getting pretty busy. This is the time that you could mess up and you know what happens if you do. You dish out two sandwiches with a little squirming guy in each to two hungry teenage girls. Next you are off to the kitchen to pick up the next finished order.

Choose a choice....
15.title: You Are A Waitress.

info.brief_description: Can you survive in a world where half the females can shrink you?
info.description:
Read rules first then the story intro at the bottom:
1.) No gay stuff, so no interaction between guys. There is only to be one guy in a scene at a time. Interaction between girls is just fine because it is hot.
2.) No animals, insects, bugs, reptiles, etc, etc; meaning only plain ordinary awesome humans. Also No, characters from cartoons, anime, TV in general, video games, etc, etc. New characters are to be totally original made from the writer's mind.
3.) The age range for characters is, 16 to 35 for females; and 16 to 28 for males.
4.) The ways that characters can be killed is; eaten, cooked then eaten, sat on, crushed by breasts, or crushed while being used for sexual purposes.
5.) If there is toilet stuff, there is to be no mentioning of crap or pee. It is to be clean. For example; She went to the bathroom and to get rid of what was left of him. It is also to be clean if the shrunken person somehow survives digestion and comes out the girl or woman's ass.
6.) The shrinking limit, 3 to 20 inches. And of course the main character can be grow back to normal. No bigger.
7.) Editions are to be written in the second person prospective; for example: You climbed up onto the couch.
8.) I am being a nice by reducing the sentence minimum to four good sentences, no less, but more would be better.
9.) Use a spell checker like Microsoft Word on your editions. I will not tolerate misspelled words and bad grammar.
10.) After the character choice and intro chapters I will put up, the choices are to give no info or hints on what might happen next, I want readers to be surprised. After those character choice and intro chapters the choices should be labeled like this: Choice.1, Choice.2, Choice.3; one in each blank. Make the correct choice and the main character gets what he or she wants.
11.) Since the choices will be blank, if you add, you must make an original title for
the chapter, be creative. Also each chapter should a both a good choice and a bad choice, so read up on the other parts of the branch you want to add to, to see what kind of choice chapter you have to write.

Intro
         In this new age, when a girl turns sixteen, there is a fifty percent chance that she will possess the incredible power to shrink anything she want's, except other girls with the power, it doesn't work on them. The power has a limit; the power only allows the user to shrink things or people to the heights of and between 3 to 20 inches. The object or person can be grown back to normal size no bigger. People that don't have the power, especially males since they will never get the power, always have to be alert, because at any moment some girl or woman might decide to use their power on them, for what ever purpose she sees fit. The most popular use by the shrinking power females for shrinking people is to use them as food, next most popular being to keep as a little companion to pleasure her or talk too. There are so many females with the power, that they can't be punished for killing people by way of the power, because they will just shrink the people that will come to detain them, so over the years the shrinking power and what the females that have it do with it, has become just another part of life.
